item.title: Beogram 4002 (5523): A Second Beogram 4002 (5523) Arrived for some TLC - First Impressions
item.description: A Beogram 4002 (5523) in need of restoration arrived with its MMC4000 cartridge still attached and transport locks disengaged, causing initial concern about potential damage. The foam meant to support the tonearm had deteriorated, leaving it to swing freely. Fortunately, the cartridge appeared undamaged, likely due to the tonearm’s light weight and protective tape. Testing on a restored Beogram 4000 confirmed its functionality. The hood was in good condition, showing only minor scratches and signs of polishing.
